name: Fairy House (Sadie)
description:
Another little magical interactive experience I made in 2021 for a different original character. It's set in the same universe as the last one so has some overlap narrative- and aesthetic-wise.

I was able to take some of what I made last year and upgrade it with what I learned since.

Controls

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move and the mouse to look around.

Use the left mouse button to click on objects (an exclamation mark will pop up when interactable objects are hovered over).

Use space to jump.

Use F to toggle fly mode on and off and then use Q and  E to fly up and down respectively (for some reason collisions don't work when this mode is on, so just be cafeful not to fly out of the room).

Free audio assets used

Background music by David Fesliyan (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/relaxing-green-nature/548)

Forest ambience by Bjorn Lynne (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g2EWqOaUTt0)

Potion shop ambience by The Guild of Ambience (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JCIfDCxakPE)
